nodes.name: OrganizationRegister
setParameters
addOrPromoteAddress
getParametersHash
OrganizationRegister
setParameters
addOrPromoteAddress
getParametersHash

devdoc.details: Organizations can use this scheme to open a registry. Other organizations can then add and promote themselves on this registry.

addOrPromoteAddress(address,address,uint.details: Adding or promoting an address on the registry.     An address(record) to add or promote can be organization address or any contract address.     Adding a record is done by paying at least the minimum required by the registry params.     Promoting a record is done by paying(adding)amount of token to the registry beneficiary.

params._amount: amount to pay for adding or promoting
params._avatar: The _avatar of the organization which own the registry.
params._record: The address to add or promote.

getParametersHash(address,uint256,addres.details: Hash the parameters ,and return the hash value

params._fee: - fee needed for register an address.
params._token: -  the token to pay for register or promotion an address.

setParameters(address,uint256,address).details: Hash the parameters, save if needed and return the hash value

params._fee: - fee needed for register an address.
params._token: -  the token to pay for register or promotion an address.

devdoc.title: A universal organization registry.
